content: any worsted weight yarn can be used for this pattern this is my new and easier version of the women s mittens/fingerless gloves 1 pattern and the men s version 2 i didn t make a size for men but i would just use this pattern and a larger hook either 6 00mm or 6 50mm my hands are small a little more than 7 inches around the palm so for a larger size use a 5 50mm i-9 or 6 00mm j-10 hook for a smaller size use a 4 50mm hook materials yarn 3½ oz 100 g hook 5 00 mm h-8 gauge 4 sts per inch 4 row per inch 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mittens-fingerless-gloves-womens 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mittens-fingerless-gloves-mens
